title: internet search
content: In Firefox browser, the Bing date search refinement pick list is unavailable and in Google advanced search the site or domain box is blank with no pick list. In Microsoft Edge, the Bing date option is working but Google advance search site or domain problem is the same.
creator: l.ogilvie274

title: Gnome Theme
content:
Hello, I recently installed the Firefox Gnome theme that was hosted in a GitHub repository. After using it for a few days I wanted to uninstall it and revert back to the original Firefox UI. But even after talking to the developer in GitHub, i am not able uninstall it. I tried to re install Firefox after deleting all the data associated with Mozilla or Firefox, from my laptop. But still the new installed version loads with the Gnome theme. How should I change it back?

Discussion with developer
creator: raghavkh05

title: Youtube em tela cheia esta com bordas
content:
Estou com bordas quando coloco meus vídeos em tela cheia no YouTube, e isto só esta acontecendo no Firefox, testei em outros navegadores, e esta normal.

As bordas acontecem no lado direito e esquerdo e em baixo. Fica aparecendo as janelas e area de trabalho ali nessas bordas. É como se o vídeo não ficasse em tela cheia e ficasse faltando um pedaço de cada lado desses.

Já tentei tirar a única extensão que eu uso, mas continua o mesmo problema. Tentei reinstalar completamente, fazer uma instalação limpa, desinstalar apagar tudo que tem do Firefox no pc e reiniciar, baixar ultima versão e instalar, mas mesmo assim o problema ainda persiste.

Queria uma solução para este problema/bug, pois o Firefox é meu navegador padrão e uso muito ele...

Irei deixar imagem anexada em baixo.

Obg desde já.
creator: brksmylla

title: youtube annotations not appearing
content: In youtube videos, creators will say "click the link above" and point and often there will be links on screen during a video for related content, aka annotations. They simply don't exist in firefox. I can't click or even see them. I opened YT in chrome and the annotations all pop up and are clickable. Annotations are turned on I've cleared cookies to no avail. Please advise.
creator: butlerjonas

title: mise à jour
content: J'utilise FF depuis qu'il existe. Avant, dans les paramètres, on avait des options pour les mises à jour. Je choisissais toujours « me demander avant d'installer mises à jour ». Depuis 2 ans, j'utilise linux. FF est installé par défaut sur Linux. Quand je veux choisir pour PARAMÉTRER les mises à jour, il n'y a aucun choix. J'ouvre souvent plusieurs fenêtres en même temps dans FF, pour les lire plus tard. Mais FF me dit de redémarer FF parce qu'il a installé des mises à jour !!! Parce que je navigue toujours en «privé», ces pages ne sont pas rouvertes au redémarrage de FF. Donc je perds beaucoup de temps, souvent au milieu d'un travail important, pARCE QUE JE DOIS RÉOUVRIR TOUTES MES PAGES ! ET IL FAIT CES MISES À JOUR DE FAÇON ALÉATOIRE, À N'IMPORTE QUELLE HEURE DU JOUR OU DE LA NUIT ! Donc je demande que FF me redonne le choix dans les paramètres. Je ne veux pas que FF installe les mises à jour quand il le décide, sans tenir compte de mon travail en cours. Ou y-a-t-il une version plus nouvelle qui permet ces choix ? Merci d'avance pour une réponse rapide. Anne
creator: annbess

title: Notification setting error
content:
I am trying to get a notification from this site( https://qualitywriters.net/pa/projects/ongoing-projects) and the bell indicating that I am "subscribed to the notification," but I am not successful. help, please. Note that the bell that indicates that " you are subscribed to notifications" appears on( https://www.prowriters.pro/). this is very important for me in my browser. Thank you.

NB: I have allowed notifications in permissions, as guided by your website manual.

However, this has not resolved the situation.

2nd issue. I want any automatic redirects to the site whenever I click on a popup notification. Let me explain further. if a notification from Mozilla comes on the PC, It cannot bring the Mozilla page automatically, I have to manually search for the tab and click it to bring it to the top of the display.

Thank you.
creator: accademicwriterss

title: Unwanted "Thank You For Loving Firefox" window on startup
content: Every time I open Firefox, as well as my StartPage Home page, an additional "Thank You For Loving Firefox" tab opens, and it does so in preference to my home page. How do I remove this "bonus feature"? In addition, an additional "Firefox View" button appears to the left of my home page tab, which I would also prefer not to be obliged to remove each time. Can I also disable this feature? OS is Linux Mint, desktop computer, with 2 TB SSD, Quad core processor, 16 Gb RAM.
creator: Ausron46

title: Version 113 has borders in fullscreen while watching youtube
content: I just upgraded firefox to v 113 64 bit with windows 7 ultimate. Now when I watch youtube in fullscreen there's a border around the screen. i don't use picture in picture and it isn't on yet the border won't go away no matter what I do. Please fix this or i will use another browser. i will include a screenshot from youtube in fullscreen mode look at it.
creator: ford1986f150
